H0.text: Stacked vertically is the arrangement that reduces the gravitational pull between two objects at rest that are 1.0 meter apart.

H1.text: Placed side by side reduces the gravitational pull between two objects at rest that are 1.0 meter apart.

H2.text: Moved 0.5 meter apart are the two objects at rest that are initially 1.0 meter apart, in order to reduce the gravitational pull between them.

H3.text: Moved 1.5 meters apart is the action that would reduce the gravitational pull between two objects that are at rest and 1.0 meter apart.

A4.text: the gravitational force between two objects is inversely proportional to the square of the distance between their centers of mass.
